docs.title: Central Intelligence
docs.text:
Welcome to your modern knowledge base. This site is indexed in real-time—use the Search (Ctrl+K) to find anything.

!!! abstract "Core Purpose" This wiki serves as a digital garden for project tracking, quick notes, and visual brainstorming using interactive mind maps.

docs.title: 🚀 Quick Navigation
docs.text:
Section Content Type Status Strategy Mind Maps 🟢 Active Technical Guides Documentation 🟡 In Progress Archive Old Notes ⚪ Empty

!!! tip "Keyboard Shortcut" Press F to focus search or S to toggle between light and dark mode.

docs.title: 🧠 Project Strategy Map
docs.text:
Hover over nodes to see connections. Click the circles to collapse branches.

docs.title: 🚀 Project Master Hub
docs.text:
This page combines visual planning with actionable tasks. Use the mind map below to navigate the project architecture.
